mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_CART(ID, CART_QUANTITY, MEMBER_ID, PRODUCT_ID) VALUES(SEQ_CART.NEXTVAL, #{quantity}, #{memberId}, #{productId})
mapper.select: SELECT TBC.ID AS id, TBC.MEMBER_ID AS memberId, TBC.CART_QUANTITY AS quantity, TBP.PRODUCT_STOCK AS productStock, TBC.PRODUCT_ID AS productId, TBP.PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, TBP.PRODUCT_PRICE AS productPrice, TBP.PRODUCT_PURCHASE_TYPE AS productPurchaseType FROM TBL_CART TBC JOIN TBL_PRODUCT TBP ON TBP.ID = TBC.PRODUCT_ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER TBM ON TBM.ID = TBC.MEMBER_ID WHERE TBM.ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY TBC.ID DESC
